title: Purgatory
description: A doppelganger, a myth with no name, no sex, no flesh, and no identity......unless it wears one of you.A wendigo half-breed, an abomination, runs from a race that wants him dead. He can't fight what he isâ€”they won't let him forget what he's done.Can two very different creatures find love in a world where hope leads to disappointment, and wishes lead to devastation? Maybe, but to do so, they will have to fight all that is Down Under.
author: Susan Stec
